Name: Bolero
Ingredients: 40 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
15 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
7.5 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist and (dehydrated) apple slice.
Express lemon zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
Review: Bone dry and spirit-forward. Be sure to stir well, as dilution is key, hence my addition of a splash of chilled water.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Stanley M. Jones' 1977 Jones' Complete Barguide .
Nutrition: One serving of Bolero contains 138 calories
